definition: Dunhuang county level city in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
kindhearted/place name
variant of 敦[dun1]
brilliant
Dunhuang county level city in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
Dunhuang caves in Gansu/refers to Mogao caves 莫高石窟[Mo4 gao1 shi2 ku1]

sentences.english: The Kizil Grottoes were built one century early than the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 克孜尔石窟营造年代早于敦煌莫高窟一个多世纪。

sentences.english: Rabbit Garden Imperial Book Repository should obtain the descendant scholars' enough attention.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌本《兔园策府》应该得到后代学者的足够重视。

sentences.english: At that time we were busy restoring the Dunhuang Murals, and could find no time for that task.
sentences.chinese: 但因为当时敦煌百废待举工作繁重，无法承担。

sentences.english: The section four research the folk culture of dunhuang telling and singing literature.
sentences.chinese: 第五节分析敦煌讲唱文学的文体类型及特点。

sentences.english: Nonetheless, city officials are pushing for more projects.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，敦煌市的官员正在更多的项目。

sentences.english: Danapati Bodhisattva, Tang dynasty, cave fresco, cave 401, Mogao grottoes, Dunhuang.
sentences.chinese: 供养菩萨，唐，石窟壁画，敦煌莫高窟第401窟。

sentences.english: Dunhuang Grottoes is a history showing with image, including abundant subjects.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌石窟壁画艺术包罗万象，是一部形象的历史。

sentences.english: We can see from this that initially the cave diggers aimed mainly at worshipping Buddha .
sentences.chinese: 可见，在敦煌开凿石窟，开始时主要是宣传佛教。

sentences.english: Dunhuang in China, deep in the heart of the Gebi Desert, was once a great city.
sentences.chinese: 中国的敦煌，地处戈壁沙漠的腹地，曾经是个大都市。

sentences.english: Characteristics and practical significance of The Illustrations of Moxibustion in Dunhuang Caves were studied and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨分析敦煌石窟《灸法图》的特点及现实意义。

sentences.english: Illustration of Raudraksa's battle with Sariputra is one of the main themes in Dunhuang arts.
sentences.chinese: 《劳度叉斗圣变》是敦煌艺术中的主要题材之一。

sentences.english: In the Dunhuang mural paintings, there exists a great amount of information about coloring practices during and before Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌的壁画保存了大量唐及唐以前的绘画设色资料。

sentences.english: The economic documents of Dunhuang temples reflect the civil accounting thoughts during the period of Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌寺院经济文书体现了唐五代时期的民间会计思想。

sentences.english: Any mention of the cooperation between the two libraries will not be complete without reference to the International Dunhuang Project.
sentences.chinese: 谈到两馆合作，不能不提及“国际敦煌项目”。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on Zheng Zhenduo's achievements of Dunhuangnology Studies.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重研究郑振铎先生在敦煌学方面的成就。

sentences.english: Documents from Turfan and Dunhuang shared similar fate in modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 吐鲁番和敦煌文献在近代史上拥有相似的历史经历。

definition: Zhangye prefecture level city in Gansu
Jiayu Pass in Gansu, at the western terminus of the Great Wall/Jiayuguan prefecture-level city in Gansu
Turpan City in Xinjiang (Chinese: Tulufan)
Mogao caves in Dunhuang 敦煌, Gansu
Hexi Corridor (or Gansu Corridor), a string of oases running the length of Gansu, forming part of the Northern Silk Road
Wuwei prefecture level city in Gansu
Dunhuang caves in Gansu/refers to Mogao caves 莫高石窟[Mo4 gao1 shi2 ku1]
Guazhou county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu
Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
Jiuquan prefecture-level city in Gansu
Gannan county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
the Silk Road
Kumul city in Xinjiang (Chinese: Hami)
Qinghai province (Tsinghai) in west China, abbr. 青, capital Xining 西寧|西宁
the Silk Road/abbr. for 絲綢之路|丝绸之路[Si1 chou2 zhi1 Lu4]
